I wasn’t sure what to expect, especially for such a low price, but was pleasantly surprised! The coat is very soft and doesn’t look like fake leather. (I guess I’m old enough to remember how plastic-looking faux leather used to look.)  Based on other reviews, I had expected to have to steam out some wrinkles but there weren’t that many to begin with and they just worked their way out on their own. There was no detectable odor at all.  And the best/funniest thing is that I (a woman in my 60’s) have gotten compliments from young men (yes, more than one!) on the jacket!
